title: How to Leverage the Negative Voice In Your Head | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.  If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.    Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: PrepDish: Go to PrepDish.com/impact to get two weeks completely free. Sanebox. Visit sanebox.com/IMPACT to sign up for your 14-day free trial and receive a $25 credit. SaneBox brings sanity back to your inbox by prioritizing what's important, removing spam/junk, grouping newsletters together, and automating tedious tasks. ButcherBox. Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   QUESTION TOPICS Tom offers advice if the voice in your head is mainly negative [3:50] How to work hard in the face of ambiguous success [6:23] How to support your family as wells yourself when a family member is struggling [9:17] Tom explains how he is able to be nice and authentic without getting walked all over [12:28] Goal oriented thinkers vs. task oriented thinkers, can you switch between the two? [19:23] Why other people succeed with similar business ideas as yours. [21:20] Is it better to wait and perfect, or get something out there that is sub-par? [24:11] Tom dispels the myth that isolation comes with entrepreneurship [26:10]
